#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        string a,b;
        cin>>a>>b;

    int i;

    int e=b.length();
    int l=a.length();
    int r=0;
    int g=0;
    int count=0;
    for(i=0,g=0;i<l,g<e;i++,g++)
        {
            if((a[i]!=b[g])&&(r==0))
            {
                g--;
                r=1;
            }
            else if(a[i]==b[g])
                count++;


        }
        if(count==(l-1))
cout<<"1"<<endl;
else
    cout<<"0"<<endl;

    }




}
